title: Front-End Web Development Books (HTML, CSS, JavaScript and more)
description:
This is a collection of highly regarded front-end development books IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve collected. Hope you find them useful.

All the books are in PDF format, except for one I could only find in epub format. There are also two links to books: one is an online book and the other is a free download from Amazon.

HTML and HTML5
Beginning HTML And CSS - Rob Larsen - March 2013
HTML and CSS - Design and Build Websites - Jon Duckett - November 2011
HTML5 - The Missing Manual - Matthew MacDonald - August 2011
The Truth about HTML5 - Luke Stevens - May 2012

CSS3
CSS3 - The Missing Manual - David Sawyer McFarland - 3rd Edition - January 2013
Practical CSS3 - Develop and Design - Chris Mills - July 2012
The Book of CSS3 - A Developer's Guide to the Future of Web Design - Peter Gasston - May 2011

JAVASCRIPT and JQUERY
ECMA-262 ECMAScript Language Specification - June 2011
Effective JavaScript - David Herman - December 2012
Eloquent JavaScript - A Modern Introduction to Programming - Marijn Haverbeke - February 2011
High Performance JavaScript - Nicholas Zakas - March 2010
JavaScript - The Definitive Guide - David Flanagan - 6th Edition - May 2011
JavaScript - The Good Parts - Douglas Crockford - May 2008
JavaScript and jQuery - The Missing Manual - David Sawyer McFarland - 2nd Edition - October 2011
JavaScript Patterns - Stoyan Stefanov - September 2010
Learning JavaScript Design Patterns - Addy Osmani - 2012 (online book)
Learning jQuery - Jonathan Chaffer - 3rd Edition - September 2011
Maintainable JavaScript - Nicholas Zakas - May 2012
Professional Javascript for Web Developers - Nicholas Zakas - 3rd Edition - January 2012
Secrets of the JavaScript Ninja - John Resig and Bear Bibeault - December 2012
Testable JavaScript - Mark Ethan Trostler - January 2013
The Past, Present and Future of JavaScript - Axel Rauschmayer - August 2012 (free download from Amazon)

MISCELLANEOUS
Learning Web Design - A Beginner's Guide to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web Graphics - Jennifer Niederst Robbins - 4th Edition - August 2012
* Canvas
Core HTML5 Canvas - Graphics, Animation and Game Development - David Geary - May 2012
HTML5 Canvas - Steve Fulton - 2nd Edition - April 2013
HTML5 Graphing and Data Visualization Cookbook - Ben Fhala - November 2012
* Optimization
Even Faster Web Sites - Steve Souders - June 2009
High Performance Websites - Steve Souders - September 2007
Web Performance Daybook Volume 2 - Stoyan Stefanov - June 2012
* Responsive Web Design
Implementing Responsive Design - Building Sites for an Anywhere, Everywhere Web - Tim Kadlec - August 2012
Responsive Web Design with HTML5 and CSS3 - Ben Frain - April 2012
The Modern Web - Multi-Device Web Development with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript - Peter Gasston - April 2013
* Usability and User Experience
Dont Make Me Think - A Common Sense Approach to Web Usability - Steve Krug - 2nd Edition - August 2005
The Elements of User Experience - User-Centered Design for the Web and Beyond - Jesse James Garrett - 2nd Edition - December 2010
User-Centered Design - Travis Lowdermilk - April 2013
